message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.Distributed Systems. 

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper presents a lightweight emulator for blockchain systems that can scale to thousands of nodes, which involves distributed computing. 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper mentions hash-based immutability, proof-of-work workload, and peer-to-peer network communications, which are all related to cryptography and security. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper discusses peer-to-peer network communications, which falls under the scope of networking and internet architecture. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper mentions an easy-to-use programming interface and customization of the system, which are related to software engineering. 
- cs.Distributed Systems: The paper presents an emulator for a distributed system, which falls under the scope of distributed systems.
